title: Build ArrayLists using scanner - write code

content.prompt: Which of the following can replace  /* missing code */  so that this code segment works as intended?

choices.label:
while (sc.hasNext())
{
   String[] temp = sc.next().split("_");
   firstList.add(temp[0]);
   secondList.add(temp[1]);
}

while (sc.hasNext())
{
   String[] temp = sc.next().split("_");
   firstList.add(temp[0]);
   firstList.add(temp[1]);
}
while (sc.hasNext())
{
   String[] temp = sc.next().split("_");
   secondList.add(temp[0]);
   secondList.add(temp[1]);
}

skill.text: 2.B: Write program code involving data abstractions.
